summary: Applies a stochastic grid-based permutation to an image and any associated targets (mask, keypoints, bounding boxes), dividing the input into a configurable number of cells and randomly rearranging those cells while preserving the spatial correspondence across all targets.
business_intent: Enhances model robustness by disrupting global layout and forcing learning from local texture or micro‑level cues, useful for tasks where global structure may cause overfitting or where subtle artifacts are discriminative.
